metadata.name: MELON PASS #1
metadata.description:
The MELON PASS NFT grants holders exclusive benefits, access, and rewards throughout the Melon Ecosystem.
          
Each minted Melon Pass Box will reveal, at random, to show one of 3 rarity levels, Silver, Gold, and Diamond. Each with its own unique features, perks, and rewards. More information can be found at https://melon.ooo
